Name: AccountCurrencyCode
Notes: The currency of the Customer account.

Name: AccountDescriptiveName
Notes: The descriptive name of the Customer account.

Name: AccountTimeZoneId
Notes: Name of the timezone of the Customer account. For example: "(GMT-05:00) Eastern Time".

Name: AdGroupId
Notes: The ID of the AdGroup.

Name: AdGroupName
Notes: The name of the AdGroup.

Name: AdNetworkType1
Enum Values:
SEARCH / Search Network
CONTENT / Display Network
Notes:
First level network type.
Predicate values / display values:
SEARCH / Search Network
CONTENT / Display Network

Name: AdNetworkType2
Enum Values:
SEARCH / Google search
SEARCH_PARTNERS / Search partners
CONTENT / Display Network
Notes:
Second level network type (includes search partners).
Predicate values / display values:
SEARCH / Google search
SEARCH_PARTNERS / Search partners
CONTENT / Display Network

Name: CampaignId
Notes: The ID of the Campaign.

Name: CampaignName
Notes: The name of the Campaign.

Name: CriteriaParameters
Notes: In the Destination URL report, this field behaves as a segment.

Name: CriteriaTypeName
Notes: The descriptive name of the CriteriaType.

Name: CriterionId
Notes: The Criterion ID.

Name: CustomerDescriptiveName
Notes: The descriptive name of the Customer.

Name: Date
Notes: The date formatted as yyyy-MM-dd.

Name: DayOfWeek
Enum Values:
MONDAY / Monday
TUESDAY / Tuesday
WEDNESDAY / Wednesday
THURSDAY / Thursday
FRIDAY / Friday
SATURDAY / Saturday
SUNDAY / Sunday
Notes:
The name of the day of the week, e.g., "Monday".
Predicate values / display values:
MONDAY / Monday
TUESDAY / Tuesday
WEDNESDAY / Wednesday
THURSDAY / Thursday
FRIDAY / Friday
SATURDAY / Saturday
SUNDAY / Sunday

Name: ExternalCustomerId
Notes: The Customer ID.

Name: Impressions
Notes: Count of how often your ad has appeared on a search results page or website on the Google Network.

Name: Month
Notes: The first day of the month, formatted as yyyy-MM-dd.

Name: Quarter
Notes: The first day of the quarter, formatted as yyyy-MM-dd. Uses the calendar year for quarters, e.g., the second quarter of 2014 starts on 2014-04-01.

Name: Week
Notes: The date for the Monday of the week, formatted as yyyy-MM-dd.

Name: Year
Notes: The year, formatted as yyyy.
